merge_datasets.description: If you want to merge the dataset uploaded and the augmented data, respond with 'true'; otherwise, respond with 'false.'

use_existing_dataset.description: If you want to use your existing dataset uploaded as a zip file, respond with 'true'; otherwise, respond with 'false.'

RGB_Shift.description: Apply random shifts in RGB color channels to the image.

HueSaturationValue.description: Randomly change the hue, saturation, and value of the image.

ChannelShuffle.description: Shuffle the color channels in the image randomly.

CLAHE.description: Apply Contrast Limited Adaptive Histogram Equalization to enhance image contrast.

RandomContrast.description: Adjust the contrast of the image randomly.

RandomGamma.description: Apply random gamma corrections to the image.

RandomBrightness.description: Change the brightness of the image randomly.

Blur.description: Apply a random blur effect to the image.

MedianBlur.description: Apply a median blur to the image for noise reduction.

JpegCompression.description: Apply random JPEG compression to the image.
